page.title: 07Hereford Catholic Life.
page.content: There are 3 main Catholic churches in or near Hereford.{Our Lady's}is a small, modern building served by {Vincentian Fathers.}Our school is attached to it.{St. Francis Xavier's is an old building in the city centre but the school is a mile away. {Belmont Abbey,}2 miles away, is a {Benedictine Monastery}where young men may train for the priesthood. The monks run a very famous public school. Polish people may go to the church run by the{Marian Fathers}at Lower Bullingham. They have very,very long sermons in Polish! We have a Convent of{Poor Clares, an enclosed order of nuns, which one of our teachers entered. There is also a Convent of the{Sisters of Charity. I go to Belmont Abbey where I am a server.
